testing.name: Testing
testing.description: A trait used for internal testing purposes.

guard.name: На страже
guard.description: Вражеские юниты должны атаковать юнит с чертой 'На страже' в первую очередь.

quick_deployment.name: Быстрое развёртывание
quick_deployment.description: Этот юнит может атаковать противника в тот же ход!

piercing.name: Бронебойный
piercing.description: Этот юнит игнорирует черты брони (лёгкая или тяжёлая).

first-strike.name: Блиц
first-strike.description: Если юнит уничтожает противника одной атакой, то не получает урона.

deadly.name: Deadly
deadly.description: Any unit dealt combat damage by this unit is instantly destroyed.

deploy.name: Deploy
deploy.description: Triggers an effect when the unit enters the battlefield.

destroyed.name: Destroyed
destroyed.description: Triggers an effect when the unit is destroyed.

suppression.name: Suppression
suppression.description: Enemy units damaged by this unit cannot attack during their next turn.

vehicle.name: Vehicle
vehicle.description: An armored or transport ground vehicle.

aircraft.name: Aircraft
aircraft.description: A flying unit, potentially ignoring Guard or requiring specific counters.
